heading: HB05487
0: AN ACT ALLOWING THE FOREIGN DECREE OF DISSOLUTION OF MARRIAGE TO BE REGISTERED WITH THE PHILIPPINE CIVIL REGISTRY EVEN IN THE ABSENCE OF A JUDICIAL RECOGNITION TO THAT EFFECT, AMENDING FOR THE PURPOSE EXECUTIVE ORDER NO. 209, OTHERWISE KNOWN AS THE FAMILY CODE OF THE PHILIPPINES
status: Pending with the Committee on REVISION OF LAWS since 2019-11-18
history:
House Bill/Resolution NO. HB05487
FULL TITLE : AN ACT ALLOWING THE FOREIGN DECREE OF DISSOLUTION OF MARRIAGE TO BE REGISTERED WITH THE PHILIPPINE CIVIL REGISTRY EVEN IN THE ABSENCE OF A JUDICIAL RECOGNITION TO THAT EFFECT, AMENDING FOR THE PURPOSE EXECUTIVE ORDER NO. 209, OTHERWISE KNOWN AS THE FAMILY CODE OF THE PHILIPPINES

SIGNIFICANCE: NATIONAL
